challenges.step: Set the dataset "Location type" as Region.

instructions.step: Open the Google BiqQuery console.
Find the project labelled "qwiklabs-gcp-01-567f4de1764a.
Click the "Action" button (represented by three vertical dots).
Click the "Create dataset" option.
Enter the dataset name as "sports".
Set the dataset "Location type" as Region.
Select "us-west1" from the available list.
Click the "CREATE DATASET" button at the bottom of the screen.
The task is now complete.

challenges.step: Set the dataset "Location type" as Region.

instructions.step: Access the BigQuery section of the Google Cloud Console.
Find the project labelled "qwiklabs-gcp-01-567f4de1764a.
Click the "Action" button (represented by three vertical dots).
Click the "Create dataset" option.
Enter the dataset name as "soccer".
Set the dataset "Location type" as Region.
Select "us-west1" from the available list.
Click the "CREATE DATASET" button at the bottom of the screen.
Locate the 'soccer' dataset in the left-hand navigation menu and click on it.
Click on the '+ CREATE TABLE' button.
Choose 'Create empty table' as the table creation method.
In the 'Table name' field, enter 'premiership'.
Add the desired columns and their data types in the 'Schema' section.
Add schema row with 'Field Name' as Team.
Add schema row with 'Field Name' as Location.
Review the table settings and click the 'CREATE TABLE' button to finish creating the table.
The task is now complete.
